function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Under-notification of cases","Impact":"Failure to control disease spread, inaccurate data for decision-making","Mitigation":"Implement robust reporting and surveillance systems, increase testing and data collection","Technologies":"Digital tools for case reporting and contact tracing","People":"General population, healthcare workers, public health authorities","Owner":"Health ministries, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Digital exclusion","Impact":"Limited access to healthcare information and services, inequality in digital health solutions","Mitigation":"Provide digital literacy education, ensure equity in access to technology, develop alternative communication channels","Technologies":"Telehealth platforms, mobile health apps, community health workers","People":"Marginalized communities, low-income populations, elderly individuals","Owner":"Government agencies, non-profit organizations, community leaders"},{"Description":"Use of digital tools for healthcare support","Impact":"Inadequate data privacy and security, potential for misinformation and data breaches","Mitigation":"Implement secure and compliant digital health platforms, provide training on data privacy and security best practices","Technologies":"Secure telemedicine platforms, encrypted communication tools, data protection software","People":"Healthcare providers, patients, individuals using digital health tools","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, technology companies, regulatory bodies"}]}
